participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Sociable, laid-back, and a bit of a dreamer. Loves to chat about cars and enjoys a mixture of movies and fitness.
participant_1.background: i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, food-loving, and a bit of a perfectionist in the kitchen. Always on the lookout for new culinary experiences.
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.
